modName: Conan Hair - a Hyborian Haircut for Barbarians
summary: Adds a square-cut hairstyle from Frank Frazetta's Conan paintings for human males.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a square-cut hairstyle from Frank Frazetta's Conan paintings for human males. I used the malehair01 as a base. This is my first try at adding custom hair into Skyrim, so it isn't probably the most elegant hair-model here on Nexus.
Notes: The hair won't show up in head-view in CK's Facegen, use instead the full view to see the hair.
More about that here:Â [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/594386-having-trouble-using-npc-editor-with-apachii-sky-hair/]http://forums.nexusm...achii-sky-hair/[/url]

Tools used:
The Conformulator
http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/9360/?
Throttlekitty's Hair Morph Helper
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6402/?
This thread was helpful too:
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/568450-custom-hair-crash-in-ck/?p=4761707#entry4761707

Also thanks to Kettlewitch and Ysolda on Beyond Skyrim for tips and guidance.

At the moment I'm not taking request concerning this file. If you encounter a serious problem with this file, please PM me.
author: Viltuska
